body_html: gcc 6.4 is not supported as a host compiler in cuda 9 (and in general, cuda 9 is not supported on ubuntu 17.10) http://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-installation-guide-linux/index.html#system-requirements. Additionally, cudnn is not supported on 17.04 even, so lowest common denominator host os is Ubuntu 16.04.
